name: Display of removable and temporary removable windshield placards
text: The placard shall be displayed in such a manner that it may be viewed from the front and rear of the vehicle by hanging it from the front windshield rearview mirror of a vehicle utilizing a parking space reserved for persons with disabilities.  When there is no rearview mirror, the placard shall be displayed on the dashboard. [L 1984, c 46, pt of §2; am L 1992, c 46, §6; am L 1997, c 308, §11; am L 2001, c 297, §8]
